alert.note: Alert for Bacon; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pierce and southeastern Bacon Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 412 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jamestown, or near Waycross, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, nickel size hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Blackshear, Bristol and Jamestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
